name: SoftSide Adventure of the Month 05: Crime Adventure
overview: Crime Adventure is the fifth in a series of monthly text adventures for multiple systems. While minding your own business outside the local arcade, you see Mrs. Fenwick get kidnapped by hoodlums. The player must explore the local neighborhood gathering clues to her location. During the adventure, the player must explore the Fenwick's home, as well as that of a gypsy, and visit several local stores looking for clues and supplies. Ultimately, Mrs. Fenwick is located underground beneath Mr. Fenwick's putting green. Using cunning, the player must return her to her forlorn husband. All commands are via 2-word VERB NOUN entries, and game play contains several object puzzles. There is no save or restore feature.
